title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project inconsistency (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project inconsistency (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When both projects P1 and P2 are selected, the 'Open Project' menu item is available, but the 'Close Project' menu item is not.
EB: When both projects P1 and P2 are selected, both 'Open Project' and 'Close Project' menu items should be available.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create two projects, P1 and P2.
2. Select both projects, P1 and P2.
